name: The Canton Group
tagline: Web & Software Development Firm in Baltimore, MD
description:
The Canton Group, located in Baltimore, Maryland, is a business technology services firm established in 1998.
Our experience has led to the development of a diverse suite of services for our Clients in the areas of Web Systems, Technology Consulting Services, Managed Application & Network Services, IT Services, Network Engineering, Interactive Media, and Graphic Design.
At the core of The Canton Group is the commitment to serve the best interests of our Clients. Regardless of the service we are providing, The Canton Group Develops Solutions and Delivers Results to our Clients. The key to our proven success is forming expert Project Teams focused on delivering optimal solutions to Customer-specific requirements. We fully understand industry best practices, and know how and where they apply, and adhere to them.
